mapper.insert:
insert into t_dict
id,
dict_level,
dict_type_code,
dict_type_name,
dict_data_code,
dict_data_name,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{dictLevel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{dictTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dictTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dictDataCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dictDataName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: SELECT id from t_dict where id < 10000 ORDER BY id desc LIMIT 1
